verses.verse: And this is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> unto them to hallow <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H3547><s%>, to minister unto me in the priest's office: take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>,

and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and cakes <S%H2471><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and wafers <S%H7550><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>: of fine wheaten <S%H2406><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> shalt thou make them <S%H6213><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> them into one <S%H259><s%> basket <S%H5536><s%>, and bring <S%H7126><s%> them in the basket <S%H5536><s%>, with the bullock <S%H6499><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and shalt wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> the garments <S%H899><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> upon Aaron <S%H175><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%>, and the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>, and gird <S%H640><s%> him with the skilfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%>;
and thou shalt set <S%H7760><s%> the mitre <S%H4701><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> upon the mitre <S%H4701><s%>.
Then shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and pour <S%H3332><s%> it upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and anoint him <S%H4886><s%>.
And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> coats upon them <S%H3801><s%>.

And thou shalt gird <S%H2296><s%> them with girdles <S%H73><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and bind <S%H2280><s%> head-tires <S%H4021><s%> on them <S%H3550><s%>: and they shall have the priesthood by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2708><s%>: and thou shalt consecrate <S%H4390><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>.
And thou shalt kill <S%H7819><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> with thy finger <S%H676><s%>; and thou shalt pour <S%H8210><s%> out all the blood <S%H1818><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> upon the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them <S%H6999><s%>, and burn them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

But the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and its skin <S%H5785><s%>, and its dung <S%H6569><s%>, shalt thou burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>: it is a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>.

Thou shalt also take <S%H3947><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.

And thou shalt slay <S%H7819><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%>, and thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> its blood <S%H1818><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it round about <S%H5439><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And thou shalt cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into its pieces <S%H5409><s%>, and wash <S%H7364><s%> its inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and its legs <S%H3767><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them with its pieces <S%H5409><s%>, and with its head <S%H7218><s%>.

And thou shalt burn <S%H6999><s%> the whole ram <S%H352><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; it is a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>.

Then shalt thou kill <S%H7819><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> of its blood <S%H1818><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right ear <S%H241><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the great toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it upon Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon his garments <S%H899><s%>, and upon his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him <S%H6942><s%>: and he shall be hallowed, and his garments <S%H899><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments with him <S%H899><s%>.

Also thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and the fat tail <S%H451><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> of the liver <S%H3516><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is upon them <S%H3225><s%>, and the right thigh <S%H7785><s%> (for it is a ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>),

and one <S%H259><s%> loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread <S%H259><s%>, and one wafer <S%H7550><s%>, out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

and thou shalt put <S%H7760><s%> the whole upon the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and upon the hands <S%H3709><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and shalt wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> them from their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> upon the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>, and wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave-offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and it shall be thy portion <S%H4490><s%>.

And thou shalt sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the wave-offering <S%H8573><s%>, and the thigh <S%H7785><s%> of the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%>, which is waved <S%H5130><s%>, and which is heaved up <S%H7311><s%>, of the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>, even of that which <S%H834><s%> is for Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and of that which is for his sons <S%H1121><s%>:

and it shall be for Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> as their portion <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; for it is a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%>: and it shall be a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, even their heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be for his sons <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H4888><s%>, to be anointed in them <S%H4390><s%>, and to be consecrated in them.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall the son <S%H1121><s%> that is priest <S%H3548><s%> in his stead put <S%H3847><s%> them on <S%H935><s%>, when he cometh into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the holy place <S%H6944><s%>.
And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration <S%H4394><s%>, and boil <S%H1310><s%> its flesh <S%H1320><s%> in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>, and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%>, at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%> those things wherewith atonement was made <S%H3722><s%>, to consecrate <S%H4390><s%> and to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H2114><s%>: but a stranger shall not eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H6944><s%>, because they are holy.

And if aught of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the consecration <S%H4394><s%>, or of the bread <S%H3899><s%>, remain <S%H3498><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>, then thou shalt burn <S%H8313><s%> the remainder <S%H3498><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: it shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%>, because it is holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, according to all that I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H7651><s%>: seven days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou consecrate them <S%H4390><s%>.

And every day <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou offer <S%H6213><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> of sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> for atonement <S%H3725><s%>: and thou shalt cleanse <S%H2398><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, when thou makest atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it <S%H4886><s%>; and thou shalt anoint it <S%H6942><s%>, to sanctify it.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it <S%H4196><s%>: and the altar shall be most holy <S%H6944><s%>; whatsoever toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be holy <S%H6944><s%>.

Now this is that which thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>:

and with the one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> a tenth <S%H6241><s%> part of an ephah of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth part <S%H7253><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>; and the fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink-offering <S%H5262><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, and shalt do <S%H6213><s%> thereto according to the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and according to the drink-offering <S%H5262><s%> thereof <S%H5207><s%>, for a sweet savor <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

It shall be a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you <S%H1696><s%>, to speak there unto thee.
And there I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the Tent shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> by my glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and the altar <S%H4196><s%>: Aaron <S%H175><s%> also and his sons <S%H1121><s%> will I sanctify <S%H6942><s%>, to minister to me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.
And I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and will be their God <S%H430><s%>.

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, that brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that I might dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah their God <S%H430><s%>.
